body: vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd("FileType", {
pattern = "${1:ft}",
callback = function()
end,
<!-- Starting Snippet -->
<node nodeID="${1}_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_N-1" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_N-11" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_T-1" trackID="T-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_B-1" trackID="B-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-1" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-11" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<!-- Dummy -->
<node nodeID="Dummy_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<!-- Substutute this line to the dummy line -->
<link gradient="0.0" length="5000" source="${2}_S-0" target="${1}_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- Substutute this line to the dummy line -->
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-0" target="${1}_N-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_T-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_N-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-11" target="${1}_B-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_T-1" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_B-1" target="${1}_S-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_S-11" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_S-1" target="${1}_S-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="5000" source="${1}_S-0" target="Dummy_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- Substutute this route to the dummy route -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${2}_S-0 ${1}_N-0 "/>
<!-- Substutute this route to the dummy route -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_N-11 ${1}_B-1 ${1}_S-11"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_B-1 ${1}_S-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_S-0 Dummy_N-0 "/>
<!-- End Route -->
